content.text:
# British Soap Award for Best Young Performer

| holder             = Amelia Flanagan, Emmerdale (2025)
| most_awards        =
| most_nominations   = Ellis Hollins (5)
}}
The British Soap Award for Best Young Performer is an award presented annually by the British Soap Awards. It has also been presented as Best Dramatic Performance from a Young Actor or Actress, Best Young Actor and Best Young Performance. First awarded in 2004, the accolade is voted for by a panel. However, solely in 2023, the public were able to vote for the winner. Emmerdale actress Amelia Flanagan is the current holder of the award.
Awards and nominees
